text: ityanvA#haq mAsAq vai vAjA# arddhamAqsA aqBidya#vO dEqvA haqviShma#ntOq gaurGRuqtAcI# yaqj~jO dEqvA~jji#gAtiq yaja#mAnaH sumnaqyu-riqdama#sIqdamaqsItyEqva yaqj~jasya# priqyaM dhAmAva# rundhEq yaM kAqmayE#taq sarvaqmAyu#riyAqditiq pra vOq vAjAq itiq tasyAqnUcyAgnaq A yA#hi vIqtayaq itiq saMta#taqmutta#ra-marddhaqrcamA la#BEta - [  ]  42
